title: 113_hr1698
content: Stabilize Medicaid and CHIP Coverage Act - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to require a state Medicaid plan to provide 12-month continuous enrollment for an eligible individual, regardless of age. Amends SSA title XXI (CHIP) to require a state CHIP plan also to provide 12-month continuous enrollment for an eligible individual.
